Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject

  • public class GameObject
extends Object
    This class that stores the attributs of a game object.
    Since:
    5/06/14.
    Version:
    2.0.
    Author:
    Jinansh, Christian.

      private Image objImage 
      private int size 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameObject(Image im, Location loc, int size)
      The constructor stores the image of the GameObject, the location, and the size of the grid it is on.

      • GameObject

        public GameObject(Image im,
          Location loc,
          int size)
        The constructor stores the image of the GameObject, the location, and the size of the grid it is on.
        Parameters:
        im - stores the image of the GameObject.
        loc - stores the location.
        size - stores the size of the grid if on.
